amendment.description: Amendment sought to require CBO to prepare the following analyses for legislation containing Federal mandates: 1) a health care impact statement which would provide an estimate of the health care costs that would result if the particular mandate is not enacted or enforced; and 2) a statement describing the benefits of the mandate, including benefits to human health, welfare, and the environment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment requiring CBO to prepare the following analyses for legislation containing federal mandates: 1) a health care impact statement which would provide an estimate of the health care costs that would result if the particular mandate is not enacted or enforced; and 2) a statement describing the benefits of the mandate, including benefits to human health, welfare, and the environment. The amendment specifies that CBO statements on mandate benefits must include a quantitative assessment of these benefits, to the extent practicable.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 254 (Roll no. 80).
